mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt, to_Char(join_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') as gdate from anafor_user where join_date between to_Date(#{lWeek},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_Date(#{today},'YYYY-MM-DD') +1 Group by join_date
select sum(cnt) as cnt, to_Char(order_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') as gdate from shop where order_date between to_Date(#{lWeek},'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_Date(#{today},'YYYY-MM-DD') +1 Group by order_date
select rownum no, name,cnt, to_Char(order_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') order_date from shop where to_char(order_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date}
select rownum no, writer, title, to_Char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-dd') writedate from notice where to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date} and code= 'N03'
select rownum no, user_name, user_id, user_gender, to_Char(join_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') join_date from anafor_user where to_char(join_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date}
